menu.menudata: select contributors.id,contributors.name from contributors,tracks,contributor_track where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) and tracks.url like '{custombrowse.audiodirurl}/{library}%' group by contributors.id order by contributors.namesort asc

select albums.id,albums.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor={artist} and tracks.url like '{custombrowse.audiodirurl}/{library}%' group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort asc

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums where tracks.audio=1 and contributor_track.track=tracks.id and tracks.album={album} and contributor_track.contributor={artist} and tracks.url like '{custombrowse.audiodirurl}/{library}%' group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc

select albums.id,albums.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.url like '{custombrowse.audiodirurl}/{library}%' group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort asc
select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and tracks.url like '{custombrowse.audiodirurl}/{library}%' order by tracks.tracknum,tracks.titlesort asc
